nodes.excerpt: Schedulr makes it easy to meet with others w/out the headache of back-and-forth emailing. Our goal with Schedulr is to help you quickly find a time to meet with others, w/out doing the calendar dance. PH users get 50% off first year or a free month!
nodes.title: Schedulr - Schedule meetings without back-and-forth emailing

nodes.excerpt: Educate users without repeating yourself over and over in live-chat. People don't like to navigate in helpcenters for hours, so give them answers immediately. Designed for SAAS who want to to reduce time spent on customer support, increase retention and MRR.

Use the extension to make comments and collaborate directly on any live website. nodes.excerpt: Holygym is an app created to give people free option to work out at home. Plenty of workouts plus workout generator gives you endless possibilities. Simple and minimalistic design sets focus on exercises. Health integration ensures you will close your rings.
